originalText.text: If I could give more stars I would. Best ob/gyn I have ever had. I have been a patient for 20yrs or so and followed her to every new location/office, she's just that GOOD!. She listens, she cares and offers good advice. I've been through it wall with her. The staff at the office is pretty awesome as well.

text.text: If I could give more stars I would. Best ob/gyn I have ever had. I have been a patient for 20yrs or so and followed her to every new location/office, she's just that GOOD!. She listens, she cares and offers good advice. I've been through it wall with her. The staff at the office is pretty awesome as well.

originalText.text:
Let me start by saying I have been searching for a new GYN since I moved to NYC 6 years ago and have been disappointed each time I've tried someone new.
I went to see Dr. Stephanie Lam at Carnegie Women's Health center for my annual exam and I had a fantastic experience. The facility was immaculate: from the lobby to the bathrooms to the exam rooms! The staff was very friendly, professional and helpful. I felt that Dr. Lam was extremely sincere and had a pleasant and warm demeanor. It was easy to feel relaxed in her presence, even after only just meeting her. I'm glad I found my new doctor!

text.text:

originalText.text: Dr. Lam is amazing.  She is very kind and makes you feel at ease.  She is extremally thorough.  I highly recommend her.

text.text: Dr. Lam is amazing.  She is very kind and makes you feel at ease.  She is extremally thorough.  I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Mixed up my results and accused me lying about my history. Staff was rude when trying to obtain information and make an appointment so I had to see the other doctor on the office.  When I tried to make another appointment with Dr. Lam she told me to see the other doctor because I saw her, when she was my physician.  Prior to that I thought she was great. Very unfortunate.

originalText.text: Dr Lam is the best! Warm, caring and thorough. I love her!! Best OB/GYN I’ve ever had.
